security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill containing only instructional content for creating React Email templates. No executable code, scripts, network calls, or dangerous capabilities. The skill aligns perfectly with its stated purpose.

content.user_title: Create transactional emails with React Email
content.value_statement: Building responsive transactional emails from scratch is time-consuming and error-prone. This skill provides clear patterns and examples for creating professional HTML emails using React Email components and a consistent layout system.
actual_capabilities: Create React Email templates in src/emails/
Use Layout component for consistent styling
Integrate Tailwind CSS classes in email templates
Send emails using sendMail utility function
Render React components to HTML for email delivery
limitations: Requires React Email and sendMail to be set up in your project
Does not include email provider integration
Does not handle email delivery infrastructure
Templates must follow the specified directory structure

best_practices: Always include previewText in Layout for better email client previews
Define explicit TypeScript interfaces for email props
Use absolute URLs with process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_URL for links
Match your app theme using bg-primary and text-foreground classes
anti_patterns: Hardcoding URLs instead of using appConfig or environment variables
Skipping the Layout component and losing consistent styling
Sending emails without error handling in the calling function

faq.question: Which React Email components are available?
faq.answer: Html, Button, Text, Heading, Link, Img, Hr, Container, and more from @react-email/components package.

faq.question: What email providers work with this skill?
faq.answer: Works with any provider supported by your sendMail implementation including Resend, SendGrid, Postmark, and AWS SES.

faq.question: How do I send emails in development?
faq.answer: Configure your sendMail function to use a local testing service or preview server during development.

faq.question: Is my email data sent to external services?
faq.answer: No. This skill only generates template code. Email sending is handled by your configured provider locally.

faq.question: Why are my emails not rendering correctly?
faq.answer: Ensure you wrap all content in the Layout component and use supported CSS properties compatible with email clients.

faq.question: How is this different from HTML email hand-coding?
faq.answer: React Email lets you build emails using familiar React components with automatic conversion to responsive HTML.
